name: Midway's Greatest Arcade Hits 2
summary: ARCADE'S GREATEST HITS: The Midway Collection 2 brings the joys of seven classic Midway arcade games to the PC. If old-school games are your thing, you couldn't ask for better titles than these: BLASTER, JOUST 2, SPLAT!, BURGER TIME, SPY HUNTER, ROOTBEER TAPPER, and MOON PATROL.
